tooltip.title: Your old usernames are replaced
tooltip.hint: If a link with an old username is clicked, it will redirect to the new username. This behaviour may change in the future.

query.error: There was an error changing your username

username.min: Username must be at least 3 characters long
username.alphanum: Usernames can only contain numbers and letters

primary.hint1: Used to log into your account

confirmed.hint1: Can be set as a Primary email

unconfirmed.hint1: Needs to be confirmed through email link

query.success: Confirmation email resent to {{email}}. Check your inbox/spam!
query.error: There was an error resending a confirmation email to {{email}}

query.success: {{email}} was set as your Primary email
query.error: There was an error setting {{email}} to Primary

email.pattern: Please enter a valid email address

query.success: A confirmation email was sent to {{email}}. Check your inbox/spam!
query.error: There was an error adding the email

toggle.subheader: Change your status for receiving posts in your Moderation Queue

query.success_on: You are now in the Moderator Posts Queue
query.success_off: You are no longer in the Moderator Posts Queue
query.error: There was an error changing your Queue status

multi_factor.title: Two-factor Authentication
multi_factor.description: Setting up two-factor authentication adds an extra layer of security in case your account is compromised.

description.restricted: Recovery codes must be generated first

disable.title: Disable Two-Factor Authentication
disable.tooltip: Your account role prevents you from disabling two-factor authentication

modal.description: Disabling two-factor authentication will remove the extra layer of security on your account. Are you sure?

query.success: Two-factor authentication has been disabled for your account
query.error: There was an error disabling two-factor authentication

sessions.title: Sessions
sessions.description: Here is a list of devices that have logged into your account. You can revoke any that you don't recognize.

query.error: There was an error revoking the session
